#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

int digitcheck(long int);

int main()
{ 
int test;
cin>>test;
while(test--)
{ long int n,i,p;
  cin>>n;
  for(i=n;i>=1;i--)
  { p=digitcheck(i);
    if(p==0)
    { cout<<i<<endl;  break;
    }
  }
}
return 0;
}
int digitcheck(long int x)
{ int r,flag=0;
  while(x)
  { r=x%10;
    if(r!=1&&r!=3)
    { flag=1; break;
    }
    x=x/10;
  }
  return flag;
}
